Title: Achilles Heel
Plot: As Carrie and Saul reel from the news that Walker is alive, the intelligence community clashes on the best way to capture him; Brody learns a shocking truth about his captivity.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Linda Purl, Sarita Choudhury, Joe Urla, Sammy Sheik, Afton Williamson, Chris Chalk, Hrach Titizian
